ambient.body: A global healthcare company optimizes IT asset management, improves transparency, and boosts remarketing returns by partnering with Iron Mountain Asset Lifecycle Management.
ambient.title:
IT assets &
 data centers

challengeMain.body: When seeking a new partner to help manage their extensive IT hardware fleet of assets, the customer's primary pain points were logistical costs and a lack of granularity in reporting, reducing overall transparency.
challengeMain.featuredStat1Body: assets collected and processed each year, with retrieval and redeployment of more than 50k remote workforce devices annually.
challengeMain.featuredStat2Body: data centers requiring expert support for asset refresh and decommissioning projects.
challengeMain.item1Body: A large bank acquired a competitor, which resulted in redundant and costly data center operations.
challengeMain.item2Body: Prior to partnering with Iron Mountain, the enterprise also faced challenges in optimizing remarketing potential across end-user devices and data center assets.

solutionMain.body: Iron Mountain's expansive operating footprint, comprehensive reporting, and technology integration capabilities solved the customer's core challenges. Implementing a streamlined device retrieval and redeployment solution, in addition to a data center decommissioning solution, allowed for improvements across the board.
solutionMain.headline: A partnership with Iron Mountain
numberedList: Improved logistical costs due to extensive global footprint and in-house logistics
Optimized delivery and transparency with end-to-end chain of custody, visibility through technology integration, and comprehensive reporting
Helped maintain consistency and compliance across locations in North America, Europe, and APAC
Stored 1,000 cubic feet total of physical, historic assets in climate-controlled, private vaults

accordion.title: IT asset disposition (ITAD) for end-user devices

valueMain.body: Through its collaboration with Iron Mountain, a global healthcare customer improved compliance, visibility, and consistency in IT asset disposition across worldwide locations, while maximizing value recovery from retired end-user devices and data center components.

bullets: Improved service delivery and transparency with an end-to-end chain of custody, visibility through technology integration, and comprehensive reporting
Streamlined the returns of remote employee devices, improving retrieval rates and enabling further use through redeployment
diamondBenefits.label: Operational benefits

bullets: Maximized remarketing returns, improving ROI and lowering TCO
Reduced logistical costs due to Iron Mountain's extensive global footprint
diamondBenefits.label: Economical benefits

bullets: Drove consistency and compliance across locations in North America, Europe, and APAC, with a secure and scalable solution
diamondBenefits.label: Strategic benefits

valueMain.headline: Expanding possibilities
